ygData.subject: Re: What Now?
ygData.msgSnippet: I disagree, I ve been fighting Cents in CB since 4th lvl (with help) and 5th and 6th lvl s solo, of course I have a Mino axe and some banded from a
ygData.messageBody:
I disagree, I've been fighting Cents in CB since 4th lvl (with help) and
5th and 6th lvl's solo, of course I have a Mino axe and some banded from a
friend....but fighting one at a time and staying clear of the trains, you
can fight in CB well before 8th lvl

Nylyan, Paladin of the 6th Circle *soon to be 7th*
Servant Of Marr

(Formerly the Paladin Reppik of the 13th Circle)
Bertoxxoulus Server


On Thu, 27 May 1999, Bronze the Paladin wrote:

> From: "Bronze the Paladin" <paladin_bronze@...>
>
> I would concentrate on the orcs near the tree city. Get a group of 3 or 4
> people and go at them. You won't really be ready for CB until maybe 8th
> level.
>
> >From: Steven Bergere <sbergere@...>
> >Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> >To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> >Subject: [eqpaladin] What Now?
> >Date: Tue, 25 May 1999 12:02:28 -0700
> >
> >From: Steven Bergere <sbergere@...>
> >
> >I am a 5th level elven paladin in Felwithe
> >i am having trouble advancing
> >i tried crushbone but the orc centurians kick my elven butt
> >any advice?
> >
> >ketryc
> >
